Tartinery is a very nice spot for brunch. Our waiter Benjamin was very kind and patient in taking our orders, and he explained us a few dishes on the menu.
I highly recommend the combo soup + petit tartine!
Grazie Benjamin !

Chestnut Mushroom Soup - surprisingly creamy and delicious. Could do with more mushroom texture as this is very pureed.

Avocado Toast - stellar. The best. Loved that the bread isn‚Äôt overly hard, so it works well with the avocado spread.

Sandwich - okay

Not a very big spot. Okay crowded for a weekday lunch. Prices are high for what it is, a sandwich. But not too out of the norm if you compare to Maman. Food is better than Maman. Service can be a little gruff.
Ramadan was amazing. He provided us with the best service. I highly recommend this place

Absolutely loved this spot! The food was amazing ‚Äî I had the chocolate and almond croissant, smashed avocado toast, and a cappuccino with oat milk. Everything was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully prepared. The ambiance was cozy and inviting ‚Äî perfect for a relaxed brunch or coffee break. Highly recommend!

I'd like to write a special review of this place, which, for me, was a great discovery since my first trip to New York. The best thing is the service offered by the waiters and waitresses. Their smiles are a priceless and wonderful addition. Mimi and Adina make you feel part of the family. They're not only charming, but also great and efficient workers. We don't just come back because we like the food and the place, but because of them. Their joy and good work make you start the day happy. Thanks a lot for everything from a Spaniards group

My friend and so are visiting the city and stopped here for brunch. I got an avocado toast with an egg and she got a smoked salmon toast with and egg.

The food was yummy and fresh but the portions don‚Äôt match the price.

We also got strawberry cocktails which were very good.

Everything here tastes fresh.

Once we came here, it became the place we always wanted to stop by for breakfast. I definitely recommend it‚Äîthe food is delicious and the environment is clean. Also, the staff are very attentive and polite. We especially thank Benjamin; every time we came, his warm smile and kindness made us very happy :)

We fancied a light brunch on our way up to the Broadway theatre for a matinee show of The Buena Vista Social Club and as we had enjoyed our brunch at the Tartinery caf√© & bar in Greenwich Village last week, we decided to try their branch on Park Ave.
The caf√© was very busy with a lot of office workers having lunch, however, we were shown to a small table for two without having to wait. The menu at this branch was very silmilar to the one at Greenwich Village, however, they didn't have the eggs benedict my wife really enjoyed there, so she had the avocado on toast with the additional of a soft poached eggs today, which she really enjoyed, and a latte. I went for the lunch combo deal of a delicious creamy chestnut & mushroom soup with a fantastic chicken salad petite tartine with celery & pistachio. We also ordered a very tasty ham & cheese croissant to share whilst we waited for our main courses.
We were served by a very friendly and helpful waitress and used the male & female toilets at the back of the caf√©. There's also a takeaway counter near the entrance selling pastries & hot drinks to go.

Many thanks to the Tartinery for the little French ich breakfast ‚ò∫Ô∏è. We had a great time. All the best to our waiter Benjamin and his colleagues. Keep up with the quality of the food and the great atmosphere ü§©

Melhor lugar de manhattan para caf√© da manh√£, brunch e at√© drinks a tarde no happy hour! O ambiente √© super agrad√°vel, a equipe super simp√°tica e as comidas e bebidas excelentes e com otimo custo beneficio! Gostei tanto que vim de manh√£ para o caf√© e retornei a tarde para o happy hour, onde aproveitei chopps e drinks bem gelados e com pre√ßos otimos! Vale muito a pena!!! Um agradecimento especial ao atendente Benjamin extremamente simp√°tico e que tornou o dia ainda mais legal ü•∞

Dit tentje was om de hoek van ons hotel. Het ziet er leuk uit.  Hip tentje met franse items op de kaart. De bediening was niet echt alert. Er werd gevraagd of wij water wouden ik zei nee en even later werd er een fles water gebracht. Bij de thee werden 2 zakjes gebracht waarvan 1 zakje niet klopte. Het handvat van de theepot is overigens gloed heet wat gevaarlijk is. Ze zouden er een server of iets omheen moeten doen. We hadden een egg en brioche toast en croque madam besteld. Ik had meer verwacht van de brioche toast. Het was simpelweg een gestoast bolletje met plakjes kaas en een zacht gekookt ei (+avocado extra) er stond niet bij dat het om een zacht ei ging vs gebakken ofzo. De tosti was een sneetje brood met ham kaas en spiegelei. Het eten was ok. De thee was wel lekker. Na het eten kreeg ik last van mijn maag. Tevens zijn er veel fruitvliegjes. Naar mijn mening is deze plek overrated of men is niks anders gewend.

Really remarkable breakfast with a nice city garden tables. Roast beef and avocado toasts wits soft boiled eggs and salmon were really good. Also, if you like the pour over coffee you will be satisfied with their regular drip which is surprisingly fruitful.

Great for a light breakfast. Sundrenched main seating area has a nice vibe. Croissants were very good and the avocado toast with the egg on top was on point. The orange juice was really good had almost stay whipped feeling to it. Whatever they did, it was really good

Abbiamo preso un salmon toast e un avocado toast deliziosi, pane buonissimo ben tostato e uovo cotto alla perfezione. Benjamin ci ha accolto con gentilezza e attenzione parlando benissimo in italiano.
Sehr sch√∂nes Caf√© und Bar. Wir wurden von Benjamin und seinem Team sehr zuvorkommend bedient (sogar auf deutsch). Das Fr√ºhst√ºck war sehr gut. Absolut empfehlenswert üëç

Wir waren bei unserem Besuch innerhalb einer Woche insgesamt 2x dort, da es uns so gut gefallen hat.

Preisleistung ist Top!
Das Essen ist wirklich lecker und macht richtig satt. Auch der Saft und Kaffe ist super!

Der Service war stets sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Besonders in Erinnerung ist uns die Begegnung mit Benjamin geblieben. Es ging alles sehr schnell. Er hat uns direkt einen Tisch am Fenster freigemacht. Super nett und war einfach sympathisch!

Healthy, tasty and fresh
It‚Äôs a good place to start your day. Here are different toasts based in sourdough or multigrain bread. Everything is very tasty, portions are so nutritious and all bread options are excellent! There are salads, bowls and soups as well. There is a choice of fresh pastries which you can order.
There are different coffees and teas, matcha and beverages. Also you can try different fresh juices and even create your own one. There are good cocktails (happy hours 4-7pm weekdays and all day during the weekends).
Wi-fi is available. There is a nice outdoor terrace. Staff is tired.

I really enjoyed breakfast here. The food was fresh and tasty, and the coffee was excellent. The service was great and the morning atmosphere was calm and relaxing. A perfect spot to start the day!

Nous avons tr√®s bien mang√©, tout √©tait d√©licieux ! Le service √©tait chaleureux et attentionn√©. L‚Äôendroit est tr√®s agr√©able et accueillant. Merci √† Benjamin pour son excellent accueil, nous reviendrons avec plaisir !

First time in NYC and Tartinery was my favourite spot to have breakfast. The food there is so nutritious and filling. Service was amazing, very nice and welcome staff. Atmosphere was great, loved how spacious is it and the music played really uplifted my mood. Thank you to Ardit for such a wonderful experience.
Inside and outside seating. Good food. A very good Bloody Mary. Asia provided excellent service. Fair prices.

Super endroit o√π prendre un petit d√©jeuner. Un choix vari√© de produits qui conviennent tant aux palais sucr√©s que sal√©s.
Nous avons √©t√© servies par Benjamin, bien sympathique, qui, cerise sur le gateau, parle fran√ßais.
Excellent food. We had an amazing brunch here. Benjamin was the nicest waiter ever

The food here is stellar. Everything is thought-out and tastes good together. The inside is nice and clean. It was easy to get a table early in the morning.

You'll get a pitcher of water to refill yourself, else order a beverage. Menu is small and easy to order from. I found it takes some time to get the check when I'm trying to leave. Sometimes the staff dropping your food off isn't able to get you something like paper, because of language issues.

I loved the smoked salmon toast with the dill and soft boiled egg. I even came back the next day and got the same thing. They were able to substitute hummus for the dairy product that came on this for me.

Never actually got to experience their services but I sat in the outdoor area near the place, which has no signage of association might I add; to rest my feet especially during this rainy day. I sat down for maybe 2 minutes before someone came to yell at me about sitting here. As Im writing this (standing might I add) now I am no longer welcome in the area according to the same person. Really sweet team this company has. I am visiting from out of town and well I can say this spot is NOT tourist friendly.
I will stress that I am NOT a vagrant nor do I have the appearance as one.
Benjamin and Ramzan were amazing servers. Came here twice in a row during our trip to NYC and everything was perfect. Best Fresh OJ I‚Äôve ever had!
They open at 8:00am and provide very good French food ,both inside and outside place is available
Excelente local para tomar caf√© da manh√£. Recomendo o bowl de iogurte, frutas vermelhas e granola. O croissant √© muito gostoso tamb√©m. O espa√ßo √© agrad√°vel e o staff amig√°vel.

Outstanding Service from Fahim!
Fahim was an amazing server ‚Äî friendly, polite, and very attentive throughout our visit. He made sure everything was perfect, from taking our order to checking in at the right moments. Our drinks were always full, and he had such a positive attitude that really made the experience enjoyable. Thanks to Fahim‚Äôs great service, we‚Äôll definitely be coming back!
Posto veramente carino per colazione e brunch a 2 minuti da grand central. Bravissimo il cameriere Benjamin ! Grazie ogni giorno ci ha fatto sentire a casa

Went here for lunch break. The staff were nice. I got an oat iced latte and fris√©e salad with smoked salmon, and it was good. I was hoping to get ni√ßoise salad, but I didn‚Äôt see on the menu. After all, it was a nice place for a quick lunch.

Friendly, smiling staff! Had the croque madam and ricotta and prosciutto tartines and cappuccinos.
Delish!

Premier petit d√©jeuner √† NYC ... les tartines sont tr√®s bonnes et un super accueil gr√¢ce √† Benjamin. Mon ado s'est r√©gal√© avec la tartine Nutella banane caram√©lis√©e !
Chocolat chaud top et le th√© du palais du th√© üòäüëç
Moment tr√®s agr√©able pass√© au Tartinery Caf√©-Bar. Nourriture, boissons et service de Benjamin (qui parle √©galement fran√ßais) extra !

Absolutely delightful experience at Tartinery Caf√©!
The food was genuinely wonderful ‚Äî the avocado smash was perfectly balanced and fresh, and the strawberry toast was a total treat, both in flavor and presentation.

A special shoutout to our waiter Ramazan, who was not only kind and attentive, but also made us feel truly welcome. His service added so much warmth to our visit.

Highly recommend this cozy spot for a delicious and relaxed brunch. Will definitely be coming back!

The food was delicious, with great coffee and smoothies.
I loved the avocado toast, and the chia bowl was perfect for starting our Sunday in the city.

The servers were very busy but still did a great job. Everything was right and fast, we were looking for a healthy brunch and we found everything here.
We ended up getting a couple of ham and cheese croissants to go.

I had a delicious breakfast here. Place is nice, full of light. Staff is welcoming and very efficient. Maybe only minor complaint would be on coffee, where I expected specialty level. I didn‚Äôt receive that but reckon the double espresso was very well executed.

En nuestra semana en NY desayunamos en tres ocasiones en esta cafeter√≠a.

La carta es variada y puedes encontrar fant√°sticas opciones para desayunar. En nuestro caso probamos el brioche con huevo, queso y bacon (delicioso), el bowl de granola, el croissant de almendras y el de jam√≥n y queso.

Todo est√° riqu√≠simo. El servicio es r√°pido y amable. Destacar la atenci√≥n de Ana.

Coffee croissant and juice were amazing. Benjamin my server was super nice :)
Thank you I‚Äôll be back!

The food, vibes, and service are exceptional! We ordered ‚ÄúEgg&Cheese Brioche‚Äù and ‚ÄúChia Bowl‚Äù with ‚ÄúCitrus Juice‚Äù. It was awesome. Special thanks to Mr.Benjamin for his exceptional and kind service! He was smiling the whole time with timely service and attentive manners. Good luck and I would definitely come again!

The food was ok, but our experience with the service was really bad.

+ the avocado toast is ok, but IMO poached eggs go way better than the boiled eggs (they only serve the latter). The hummus with extra smoked salmon was good

- they waiter took 5 minutes to write down our order and he forgot 1 out the 3 dishes. We had to ask 3 times for napkins at the table
- the coffee is average. They offer alternative milk which is nice, but the cappuccino lacks in flavor
Fantastic breakfast place! Thank you,  Benjamin was warm and friendly.
